TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LoginTextLayout extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the position of labels relative to their associated text boxes for the control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the LoginTextLayout enumeration to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextLayout%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
[!code-vb[LoginLoginTextLayout#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_315_1.aspx)] [!code-cs[LoginLoginTextLayout#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_315_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout TextOnLeft = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Places labels to the left of the associated text entry fields.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout TextOnTop = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Places labels above the associated text entry fields.
